abstract: Netflix says it lost 800,000 subscribers in the United States in three months, a notable decline after years of consistent growth. Its stock fell sharply after the announcement.
snippet: Netflix says it lost 800,000 subscribers in the United States in three months, a notable decline after years of consistent growth. Its stock fell sharply after the announcement.
lead_paragraph: Netflix said Monday that it ended the third quarter of the year with 23.8 million subscribers in the United States, a loss of 800,000 in three months, representing a notable decline after years of consistent growth.

headline.main: Netflix Loses Subscribers, Though Earnings Rise
